attributes.action: give status to british children's parents
attributes.additional_details: british children need their parents to have a legal status in the UK to enhance their way of life and education, and also their well being, it is a human right to have a father and a mother to grow up with, in France papers are given to parents, that is why divorce rates in the UK is the highest in Europe, the law is not good enough when european citizens can get married to illegals and have p\pers when British cannot,
